title: Premium Dating App Template
description: A visually stunning and premium dating app template with autumn warm color themes, radial gradients, and subtle animations.
generation_hints: Implement full-screen hero section with scroll sections
Use autumn warm colors (#962D3E, #F4A261, #FFDDAC) consistently
Add radial gradients for depth and visual interest
Implement smooth scroll behavior between sections
Use framer-motion for subtle animations on scroll
Add floating elements with layered depth effects
Implement rich gradient overlays on hero images
Use zustand to persist user preferences
Add proper loading states with warm-themed skeletons
Use @tanstack/react-query for efficient data fetching
Implement search with real-time filtering
Add testimonial carousel with auto-rotation
Use proper ARIA labels for accessibility
Implement pricing cards with popular badge highlights
Add contact form with validation using react-hook-form and zod
Use date-fns for relative time formatting
Implement profile cards with shadow-md effects
Add pulse animations on key CTAs
Use interactive states on all clickable elements
Implement responsive grid layouts for different screen sizes
Add proper error handling with warm-styled error messages
Use next/image for optimized image loading
Implement socket.io for real-time notifications
Add gradient overlays on profile images
Use proper focus management with warm ring styles
